abstract: The array of transforms that was used to create a compound shape.
overview:
## Discussion

You provide this array of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSValue] objects, each containing an [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNMatrix4-swift.struct] value, in the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsShape/init(shapes:transforms:)] method to create a compound shape. Use this array along with the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsShape/sourceObject] property to recover the information that was used to create the shape.

If the shape was created with the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsShape/init(geometry:options:)] or [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsShape/init(node:options:)] method, this property’s value is `nil`.

# transforms

**Instance Property**

The array of transforms that was used to create a compound shape.

## Declaration

```swift
var transforms: [NSValue]? { get }
```

## Discussion

You provide this array of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSValue] objects, each containing an [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNMatrix4-swift.struct] value, in the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsShape/init(shapes:transforms:)] method to create a compound shape. Use this array along with the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsShape/sourceObject] property to recover the information that was used to create the shape.

If the shape was created with the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsShape/init(geometry:options:)] or [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsShape/init(node:options:)] method, this property’s value is `nil`.

## Getting Information About a Shape

- **sourceObject**: The object that was used to create the shape.
- **options**: The options dictionary that was used to create the shape.
